Question
========

We measure one group of patients before and after a particular procedure. To test whether the population averages before and after surgery are equal to each other, we use a

Answerlist
----------

* Pooled T-test
* CRD-ANOVA
* Paired T-test
* RCB-ANOVA

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Pooled T-test: Incorrect
* CRD-ANOVA: Incorrect
* Paired T-test: Correct
* RCB-ANOVA: Incorrect
